airtrafficcontrol.app.utils

Class ReadListOfFlights

  • java.lang.Object
    • airtrafficcontrol.app.utils.ReadListOfFlights

  • public class ReadListOfFlights
extends java.lang.Object
    Class whose instances read a list of flights from a text file and create an instance of Database.
    Author:
    Eva Gomes, Hugo Leal, Lucas Andrade

      Constructors

      Reads a text file and converts each line into a String, then stores all the Strings in a ArrayList.
      static java.util.Calendar createDefensiveCopyOfTheDate(java.util.Calendar dateToCopy)
      Makes a defensive copy of the calendar, so that when the copy is altered, the original is not.
      Database readFlights(java.lang.String name)
      Reads a text file and creates a new database with the flights' information contained in the file.

    • Method Detail

      • readFlights

        public Database readFlights(java.lang.String name)
                     throws InvalidFlightIDException,
                            InvalidArgumentException,
                            java.io.IOException
        Reads a text file and creates a new database with the flights' information contained in the file.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the file to read, which must be in the directory «src/airtrafficcontrol/filestoread/».
        Returns:
        An instance of Database with all the flights whose information was correctly written in the text file.
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - If name is null.
        InvalidFlightIDException
        java.io.IOException - If it is not possible to read the text file or close the reader.

      • convertFileLinesIntoStringArrayList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> convertFileLinesIntoStringArrayList(java.lang.String name)
                                                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a text file and converts each line into a String, then stores all the Strings in a ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the text, which must be in the directory «src/airtrafficcontrol/filestoread/».
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of strings in which each entry corresponds to a line of the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • createDefensiveCopyOfTheDate

        public static java.util.Calendar createDefensiveCopyOfTheDate(java.util.Calendar dateToCopy)
                                                       throws InvalidArgumentException
        Makes a defensive copy of the calendar, so that when the copy is altered, the original is not.
        Parameters:
        dateToCopy - The date we want to copy.
        Returns:
        The copied date.
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException
